alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Broward County through 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Coral Springs to Miramar. Movement was northeast around 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Cooper City, Parkland, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Nova Southeastern University, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road and Pine Island Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
